settings.content_2: All Jasion bikes are covered under our manufacturer's 1-year all-inclusive warranty for the original owner against all manufacturing defects (All free Accessories are not covered by warranty service).

settings.title: EstablishmentÔºöSpecially designed for off - road adventures.
settings.content: The adventurous off-road genes of jasionbike were born with X-Hunter, defining what a bicycle can achieve in adventure and off-roading. It symbolizes jasionbike's bold innovation. X-Hunter integrates sports and leisure, allowing consumers to adapt perfectly to any scene. It represents rugged durability and unparalleled performance, urging you to embark on new paths and embrace the thrill of the unknown.

settings.title: Design
settings.content: X-Hunter‚Äôs wide tire design demonstrates our pursuit of e-bike performance and stability. The 20-inch x 4-inch wide tires not only provide a larger ground contact area and enhance traction, but also effectively improve driving stability. This means you can tackle any terrain with ease, whether it's rugged mountain roads, sand or snow, all while maintaining a stable driving experience. This design not only makes the X-Hunter an electric bicycle suitable for adventure, but also allows riders to enjoy the fun in the outdoor environment.

settings.title: Craftsmanship
settings.content: From a technological perspective, X-Hunter is equipped with a four-link structure that drives the movement of the entire electric bicycle through a central four-link structure. Combined with the 180mm adjustable front fork suspension, X-Hunter implements a full suspension system, providing riders with excellent suspension performance. This full-suspension design uses Horst link pivots to provide long-lasting comfort for off-road adventures, allowing riders to enjoy a smooth ride over rough terrain and explore uncharted territory without being limited by terrain.

settings.title: Finished Product
settings.content: With X-Hunter, we redefine the essence of off-road adventure. It transcends mere transportation; it embodies bravery and exploration. Whether conquering rugged mountains or traversing dense forests, X-Hunter allows you to embrace the infinite possibilities of off-road exploration and redefine your adventure at every turn.

settings.text: Introduction to the X-Hunter Parts Exploded View

settings.title: Feature name
settings.content: Share useful information about your product features.

settings.title: The speed for each PAS level of Jasion¬Æ X-Hunter
settings.content: PAS1 Top speed 16mphÔºåPAS2 Top speed 18mphÔºåPAS3 Top speed 20mphÔºåPAS4 Top speed 23mphÔºåPAS5 Top speed 30+mph

settings.text_main: Jasion¬Æ EB7 2.0 Fat Tire Folding Electric Bike
settings.text_sub: Jasion EB7 all-terrain electric bike is an affordable e-bike. A sustained 500W brushless geared hub motor allows you to ride freely through the city blocks and dirt roads just like the breeze. 55 miles on a single charge, 20'' √ó 3.0'' Fat Tires, and double shock absorption, all for safer and smoother cycling.

settings.title: Give you an exciting experience of speed and power.
settings.content:
Under the 5 - speed setting, it can provide a torque of 85 Nm in just 2 seconds. The motor is designed with a sine - wave structure, allowing you to easily control the riding speed between gears 1 to 5.
It meets all your various needs and helps you conquer any road challenges. Whether you are zipping through the city or bravely facing the polar vortex, find the mode that suits you best and dominate every adventure.

settings.title: Equipped with a Powerful 1400W Motor
settings.content: Delivering 90 Nm of torque within just 2 seconds in the 5-speed setting. The motor, designed with a sine wave structure, allows you to effortlessly control your riding speed across gears 1 to 5, providing a customizable and intuitive riding experience.

settings.title: Samsung 48V13A Battery
settings.content: Utilizing the newly developed 18650 battery cells from Samsung SDI, each lithium-ion single cell measures 18mm in diameter and 65mm in length, combining to form a 48V13A configuration. Jasion Bike incorporates a quick-detachable sealed design achieving an IPX-6 waterproof rating. The battery is removable for charging and holds UL 2271 international certification, while the entire vehicle is certified under UL2847 international standards.

settings.title: Efficient Performance: 70-Mile Range on a Single Charge
settings.content: Utilizing Samsung SDI's newly developed 21750 cells, each lithium-ion cell has a diameter of 21 millimeters and a length of 75 millimeters, forming a 48V13A configuration. The 21750 battery cell capacity is increased by 35%, and its volume energy density is nearly 20% higher than the original 18650 cells. Jasion Bike employs a quick-detach sealed design for the battery, with multiple layers of protective sheathing achieving an IPX-6 waterproof rating. The battery features removable charging.

Assist Mode: Effortless walking and pushing the bike without exertion.
Sport Mode: Enhanced torque for quick acceleration and higher power output.
Pedal Assist Mode: Easier pedaling while still enjoying the fun of cycling.
Pure Electric Mode: No need to pedal; control the speed using electronic controls.

settings.title: A smooth and comfortable riding experience.
settings.content: X-Hunter employs a front fork with manually adjustable shock absorption and a four-link mechanism to achieve a high-intensity suspension effect for the entire bike. The multi-link suspension configuration enables integrated dissipation of forces, allowing X-Hunter to bear a load capacity of up to 330 pounds. Whether navigating snowy terrain, rough surfaces, or mountain trails, it provides a stable and comfortable riding experience.

settings.title: Fold easily for convenient transportation and storage.
settings.content: Jasion Bike takes pride in its cutting-edge quick multi-stage disassembly design. With no need for cumbersome tools, just a few simple steps allow for the rapid disassembly of various components, ensuring easy portability and storage.

settings.title: Guidance on Switching X-Hunter on and off and Removing Batteries
settings.content:
1. On the right side of the electric bike, insert the key into the lock hole. At this time, the electric bike is turned off.
2. Turn the key to the right to start the electric bike.
3. Turn the key to the left to turn the electric bike off. Press the key inward and turn it to the left until the button is recessed. Remove the key and take out the battery.

settings.title: Big Bike Saddle Cushion
settings.content: X-Hunter saddle features a dual shock absorption structure, with dimensions measuring 11 inches in length, 10 inches in width, and 3.15 inches in height, ensuring prolonged comfort during rides.

settings.title: 20" x 4" Puncture-Resistant Tires
settings.content: The high-quality fat tires provide extra protection against punctures from thorns, glass, and other small materials.

settings.title: Full Suspension System for the Entire Bike
settings.content: Equipped with front fork shock absorption and a four-link shock absorption system, achieving a full bike suspension system. It absorbs most of the jarring bumps and vibrations during rides, providing a comfortable riding experience.

settings.title: Headlight&Taillight
settings.content: Brighter LED headlights, make riding more convenient and safer. The integrated taillight will flash when brake, making it a warning light at night.

settings.title: Shimano 7-Speed & Motorcycle-Style Hand-Twist Throttle
settings.content: The Shimano 7-Speed gear shifter makes your ride smoother, and the motorcycle-style hand-twist throttle allows for easy control of the electric bike's speed

settings.title: Foldable Electric Bike
settings.content: The foldable and portable design makes the X-Hunter e-bike easy to carry and fits stock into any compact space, such as an apartment, subway, or car trunk.Folding Size: 29.5"*33.5"*15.7"(Inch)

settings.title: Dual Disc Brake System
settings.content: The sensitive brake system with the front and rear 160mm disc rotors can provide sufficient braking force at a short distance whether in wet or dry conditions.

settings.title: The Main Features
settings.content: "More detailed feature introduction for the X-Hunter Electric Bicycle."

settings.title: What's your shipping policy?
settings.content:
Jasion has suspended local pick-up services in the United States. If pick-up services are resumed, we will update the information on our website. Please check the website for updates.

We provide UPS, USPS, and FedEx shipping services. No tax is needed. We DO NOT ship to PO BOXES.

In-stock orders typically ship within 2 business days, unless otherwise noted on the product page. Please allow 5-7 business days for your shipment to arrive at your address. Any delivery dates provided by JASION are estimates.

For more shipping information, send an email to support@Jasionbike.com. We will get back to you in 24 hours.

Want to know more about shipping policies, please check more details on our Shipping Policy Page.

settings.title: What's your warranty policy?
settings.content:
All JASION bikes carry a one(1) year warranty from the date of receipt of the bike for manufacturing defects in materials and/or workmanship( all free accessories are not covered).

We will replace any component that is defective or damaged in materials and/or workmanship( including the damage in the processing of shipment).

Before making a warranty claim, we suggest that you first contact us at support@jasionbike.com.

Want to know more about warranty policies, please check more details on our Warranty Policy Page.

settings.title: What's your return&refund policy?
settings.content:
We provide exchange service within 14 days. If the product is defective or damaged, Send damaged photos or videos to customer service within 14 days after receiving the goods, and the damaged parts can be replaced or compensated. We will cover the return (exchange) shipping costs.

In the case of non-quality returns, the customer will be responsible for the return shipping costs.

You can always contact us for any return questions at support@jasionbike.com.

Want to know more about return and refound policies, please check more details on our Return&Refund Policy Page.

settings.title: Do you support US local pickup?
settings.content:
Certainly! Please check the warehouse information here.(Address: ‚ë†RIA 2380 W Baseline Road Dock Door #3, Rialto, CA 92376Time: Mon-Fri 7:00-15:00 ‚ë°DAO_CA_US 1001 South Doubleday Ave, DOCK#19, Ontario, CA 91761).

If you choose to pick it up, please pick it up from the warehouse within two days since you receive BOL, or the order will be voided. You will need to pay the warehouse placement fee, which is ten dollars per ebike per day.

settings.title: Does my height suit X-Hunter?
settings.content: The recommended rider height is 5'3" to 6'4".

settings.title: How long does it take to fully charge the battery?
settings.content: It will take 6.5-7 hours.

settings.title: How long will it take for my shipment to arrive?
settings.content: Generally, your order will be shipped within one business day after the order is placed, and package shipping will take approximately 3-5 days.

settings.title: Does my Jasion ebike come pre-assembled?
settings.content: Your e-bike arrives 85% assembled. There are just a few pieces to put into place once you take the bike out of the box. For unboxing and setup instructions, please follow the guides on our YouTube Channel.

settings.title: What is the maximum speed of each PAS level?
settings.content:
• PAS1 Top speed 16mph
  • PAS2 Top speed 18mph
  • PAS3 Top speed 20mph
  • PAS4 Top speed 23mph
  • PAS5 Top speed 30+mph

settings.title: Assembly Video-Quick and Painless Setup
settings.content: Dive into the world of electric biking with our easy-to-follow installation video. In just a few simple steps, you'll have your bike assembled and ready for the road. No hassle, no stress‚Äîjust seamless setup for an instant riding experience.
settings.author: Jasion Bike

settings.title: A Budget Friendly Full Suspension eBike | Jasion X-Hunter eBike Review
settings.content: Jasion X Hunter is an exceptional full suspension Fat Tire e-bike. Comes in a variety of colors. The bike is also foldable and weighs 71 lbs, which is relatively light for a full-suspension Fat Tire e-bike. The seat is very wide and plush. Overall, the Jasion X-Hunter is a solid choice for those looking for a reasonable price.
settings.author: Eric Hernandez

settings.title: AWESOME  FOLDING E‚ÄìBIKE Jasion X-Hunter
settings.content: The Jasion X Hunter E-bike is a 1200-watt folding e-bike with a budget-friendly price. It has a 7-speed Shimano shifter and a full suspension. Goes a 55-mile range, 28 mph top speed. The software is simple, clicking the M menu button to click through various things. I enjoy the bike and recommend it.
settings.author: The Inja

settings.title: Jasion X-Hunter - Low Price Dual Suspension Ebike
settings.content: Jasion X-Hunter equips 1200 powerful motor. The riding position is comfortable, with an adjustable height seat and tall stem. The bike's full suspension is fairly good, and the fat tires and comfortable seat make for a smooth ride even off-road.  X-Hunter is a great value for those looking for a versatile and feature-rich bike.
settings.author: NPL Ventures

settings.title: Jasion X-Hunter Ebike Review ~ A Full Suspension electric bike at a decent price!
settings.content: The Jasion X-Hunter is a 4in fat tire ebike with a 22 amp controller, 13 amp hour battery, and a dual suspension system. I test the bike's power, speed, and brakes by riding up hills and going down steep inclines. The bike costs $939 with free shipping and it's worth buying.
settings.author: Jeremiah Mcintosh
